Title: The Statue
Writer: Aaron Korsh (created by), Genevieve Sparling, Sharyn Rothstein (executive story editor), Sandra Silverstein (executive story editor)
Actors: Gabriel Macht, Patrick J. Adams, Rick Hoffman, Meghan Markle
Plot: Harvey butts heads with his partners over a bold move; Mike pursues a pro bono case with the legal clinic; and Donna's actions raise tough questions at the firm.
